name: Claude Code
description: Interactive CLI tool for software engineering tasks powered by Claude AI

slash_commands.details: Users can create custom slash commands in .claude/commands/ directory

multi_file_editing.details: Can read, edit, and create multiple files in parallel

codebase_understanding.details: Uses specialized Explore agents for codebase exploration and analysis

git_integration.details: Full git support including commits, branches, and PR creation via gh CLI

terminal_access.details: Can execute bash commands with proper sandboxing

web_search.details: Built-in web search and fetch capabilities

mcp_servers.details: Supports Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers for extensibility

parallel_agents.details: Can launch multiple specialized agents for complex tasks

hooks.details: Supports custom hooks configured in settings that execute shell commands in response to events like tool calls
